title: Unnai Naan Song Lyrics Jay Jay
stanzas:
Unnai Naan Song Lyrics Jay Jay
#Bharadwaj #Hariharan

Unai naan unai naan
unai naan
kandavudan kandavudan
kandavudan
nenjukulle nenjukulle
nenjukulle
latcham siragugal
mulaikkudhe

nee suriyanai suttuvidum
thaamaraiyaa
ennai mella mella
kolla varum mohiniyaa

Jay jay unakku jay jay
Jay jay unakku jay jay

Unai naan unai naan
unai naan
kandavudan kandavudan
kandavudan

sokkupodi konda
sudar vizhiya
thikki thikki vandha
siru mozhiya
edhu edhu ennai
iluthathu nee solladi

ettu millimeter punnagaya
muthu parkal sindhum
mudhal oliyaa
edhu edhu ennai
iluthathu nee solladi

mugathil irundha
pillai kurumba
moodikidantha
joadi thimiraa

enna solla eppadi solla
edhuga mona kaivasam illa

unnai enni kondu
ulle patrikondu
ullam noguthadi
en uchchi veguthadi

nee suriyanai suttuvidum
thaamaraiyaa
ennai mella mella
kolla varum mohiniyaa

Jay jay unakku jay jay
Jay jay unakku jay jay
..
kandavudan kandavudan
kandavudan

Marumurai unai
sandhippenaa
malar kannukulle
vasippenaa
malai thuli engae
endru kadal kattuma

vetkam indri
mannil alaivaene
rekkai indri
vinnil thirivene
uyir engae engae
endru udal thaedume

padharum idhayam
thondi eduthu
sidharu thaengaai
pottu mudithu
udaintha satham
undhidum munne
engae sendraai
evvidam sendraai

ennai paarkum podhu
kangal paarthu sollu
kanne en pola
neeyum kadhal kondaayaa

nee suriyanai suttuvidum
thaamaraiyaa
ennai mella mella
kolla varum mohiniyaa

Jay jay unakku jay jay
Jay jay unakku jay jay

Unai naan unai naan
unai naan
kandavudan kandavudan
kandavudan
nenjukulle nenjukulle
nenjukulle
latcham siragugal
mulaikkudhe

nee suriyanai suttuvidum
thaamaraiyaa
ennai mella mella
kolla varum mohiniyaa
